title: Mechanic
description: SECOR, a leading distributor of High Density Polyethylene pipe, McElroy Fusion Equipment, and a manufacturer of custom fabricated fittings, has an opening for a Mechanic at our office located at 17321 Groeschke Rd Houston, TX 77084. The applicant must be mechanically inclined and have experience with repairing various types of machines and equipment.

body.heading: Essential Duties/Experience
body.text:
-Repair fusion equipment, tapping tools, steel and polyethylene squeeze tools

-Identify the problems that may be occurring with faulty equipment, prior to repairing

-Work with fellow mechanics and employees to determine priority of repairing tools.

-Working knowledge of hand tools and other power tools is preferred

-Ability to read/speak in English is preferred
